name: Add or open direct message from profile info in reply thread

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Add or open direct message from profile info in reply thread
--------------------
1. Open a reply thread that has another user in it
2. Click or tap the profile picture of another user
3. On the profile info, click or tap `Send Message`
inline.expectedResult: After 3. DM channel opens with other user's name as the channel title

inline.description: 4. Post a message in the DM channel
inline.expectedResult: After 4. Message posts successfully (can also verify other user received mention and message)
